Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
InventoryManagement.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Manages the inventory of medicines.

    Inventory()

    • medicines

      private List<Medicine> medicines

    • INVENTORY_FILE

      private static final String INVENTORY_FILE
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()
      Constructor initializes the inventory by loading existing medicines from the file.

  • Method Details

    • loadInventory

      private void loadInventory()
      Loads medicines from the inventory file. If the file does not exist, an empty inventory is initialized.

    • parseCSVLine

      private String[] parseCSVLine(String line)
      Parses a CSV line, handling commas within quoted strings.
      Parameters:
      line - The CSV line to parse.
      Returns:
      An array of parsed fields.

    • saveInventory

      private void saveInventory()
      Saves all medicines to the inventory file.

    • escapeCommas

      private String escapeCommas(String input)
      Escapes commas in strings to prevent CSV parsing issues.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string.
      Returns:
      The escaped string.

    • medicineExists

      public boolean medicineExists(String medicineName)
      Checks if a medicine exists by its name.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      True if the medicine exists, otherwise false.

    • medicineIDExists

      public boolean medicineIDExists(String medicineID)
      Checks if a medicine exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - The ID of the medicine.
      Returns:
      True if the medicine exists, otherwise false.

    • addMedicine

      public void addMedicine(Medicine medicine)
      Adds a new medicine to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The Medicine object to add.

    • getMedicineByName

      public Medicine getMedicineByName(String name)
      Retrieves a medicine by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The Medicine object if found, otherwise null.

    • getMedicinePrice

      public double getMedicinePrice(String name)
      Retrieves the price of a medicine by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The price per unit if found, otherwise 0.0.

    • getStockLevel

      public int getStockLevel(Medicine medicine)
      Gets the stock level of a medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The Medicine object.
      Returns:
      The current stock level.

    • updateStock

      public void updateStock(Medicine medicine, int quantity)
      Updates the stock level of a medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The Medicine object to update.
      quantity - The quantity to add (positive) or subtract (negative).

    • getLowStockAlertLevel

      public int getLowStockAlertLevel(Medicine medicine)
      Gets the low stock alert level of a medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The Medicine object.
      Returns:
      The threshold value.

    • setLowStockAlertLevel

      public void setLowStockAlertLevel(Medicine medicine, int alertLevel)
      Sets the low-stock alert level for a medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The Medicine object to update.
      alertLevel - The new threshold value.

    • checkLowStock

      public void checkLowStock()
      Checks and displays medicines that are below their threshold stock level.

    • displayInventory

      public void displayInventory()
      Displays the entire inventory, including medicine ID, name, stock, threshold, and price.
